Control Name: 4.18. Ensure server parameter 'log_retention_days' is greater than 3 days for PostgreSQL Database Server
Control Statement: Enabling log_retention_days helps PostgreSQL Database to Sets number of days a log file is retained which in turn generates query and error logs. Query and error logs can be used to identify, troubleshoot, and repair configuration errors and sub-optimal performance.
